awd_titl_txt: Enhancement of Remote Sensing/GIS Instruction for           Undergraduates
awd_abstract_narration: The Department of Plant and Soil Science and the Alabama Center                 for Applications of Remote Sensing (ACARS) Laboratory is                        acquiring equipment for instruction in spatial analysis and                     image processing of radiometric data and manipulation and                       modeling of geographical data.  The project is enabling                         students being trained in soil science, physical geography and                  cartography, plant science, environmental science and forestry                  an opportunity to acquire a working knowledge of the current                    technology being used in the workplace.  Specialized                            instruction in the use of the equipment and basic applications                  of its use in decision-making processes is being developed.***//
